import React from 'react'; import "tailwindcss/tailwind.css" import InputRange from 'react-input-range'; import 'react-input-range/lib/css/index.css' import depop from '../assets/depop.png'; import ebay from '../assets/ebay.png'; import gumtree from '../assets/gumtree.png'; import facebook from '../assets/facebook.png'; import etsy from '../assets/Etsy.png'; import trashnothing from '../assets/Freecycle.png'; //import './Listing.css'; export class PopUpSearchSettings extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.updateFilters = this.updateFilters.bind(this); this.state = { value: { min: Math.floor(this.props.maxResultPrice/6), max: Math.floor(this.props.maxResultPrice/1.5) }, }; } updateFilters() { let newSearchTerm = document.getElementById("searchQuery").value; let ebayValue = document.getElementById("ebayValue").checked ? true : false; let depopValue = document.getElementById("depopValue").checked ? true : false; let gumtreeValue = document.getElementById("gumtreeValue").checked ? true : false; let facebookValue = document.getElementById("facebookValue").checked ? true : false; let etsyValue = document.getElementById("etsyValue").checked ? true : false; let trashnothingValue = document.getElementById("trashnothingValue").checked ? true : false; console.log(ebayValue + newSearchTerm + ebay) // this.props.setSiteFilters(newSearchTerm) } render() { return (
